Verses.11: But if the Spirit of Him who raised Jesus from the dead dwells in you, He who raised Christ from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through His Spirit who dwells in you.
Verses.16: The Spirit Himself testifies with our spirit that we are children of God.
Verses.17: If we are children, then we are also heirs. Heirs of God and coheirs with Christ. If indeed we suffer with him, so that we may also be glorified with him.

Changes: 2023-08-06 Paul Prins: First translation of verses 16-17 based on Greek.
2022-06-04 Paul Prins: First translation of verse 11 based on Greek.
